          <title>
            <string language="fr">L'orbite du satellite autour de la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Satellite's orbit around the Earth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bahn des Satelliten um die Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órbita do satélite em torno da terra</string>

          </title>

          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre les orbites d'un  satellite  à et d'un satellite de transmission autour de la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the orbits of a weather satellite and of a communication satellite around the Earth.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Bahnen eines

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as órbitas de um 
satélite de tempo e de um satélite de comunicação em torno da

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra le orbite di un

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις τροχιές ενός 
καιρικού δορυφόρου και ενός δορυφόρου επικοινωνίας γύρω από τη 
γη.</string>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las órbitas de un 
satélite y de un satélite de comunicación alrededor de la tierra.</string>
